ai-anya-e0105n4:1_1: And although he said this: “Even if the Buddha was still unfinished, it was not easy to give to them by great treasures, how will he show them?
ai-anya-e0105n4:1_2: The one who shows no way to speak the treasure, and there is no danger for fear in it.
ai-anya-e0105n4:1_3: On the contrary, the two brothers were told by the Lord of the World, the Champion, and the daughters of the Seers, the Counter, the Sole Protector of the Commentaries, and so on.
ai-anya-e0105n4:2_0: But having the previous root of the earlier in the very same way, yet only the whole world, is only a joint or only a perfected one.
ai-anya-e0105n4:2_1: For this meaning of the phrases is invalid and not to be done for the purpose of protection, safety, and uninterruptedly. Instructing the meaning, what is the delimited and example of it’s needed for two or three leagues? What can be explained invalid and disparaged?
